techniqueRules: Toast chiles and spices before blending.
Cook tomato-onion base down until concentrated.
Balance rich sauces with lime and herbs.
substitutions: No dried chile -> smoked paprika + mild chile powder
No fresh tomato -> canned fire-roasted tomato

snippets.text: Comfort profile should feel generous, layered, and table-centered.
Weeknight profile keeps concentrated base but shortens simmer with one-pot flow.
Oaxacan cues: toasted chile complexity, earthy spice, restrained sweetness.
For mild requests, remove seeds and favor aromatic chiles while preserving depth.
